description: To help make their Men’s Athlete Edition Run Raven Print Crew Socks performance-driven, Smartwool tapped ultrarunner Rob Krar to benefit from his experience logging hundreds of miles on all different terrain. The result is as eye-catching as it is functional: With ZQ-certified Merino wool as its odor-resistant base, this sock adds in a performance-oriented fit, a Virtually Seamless™ toe, and breathable mesh zones. It’s all capped off with Indestructawool™ and Shred Shield™ technologies for enhanced durability. This men’s run sock is bound to help your feet go far and feel good while you go the extra mile (or hundred).
name: Smartwool Athlete Edition Run Raven Print Crew Socks - Mens
